mapper.select: SELECT USER_SR_NO, REF_UNO, REF_RUNO, ROOM_TYPE, BUILDING_TYPE, U.ADDRESS, DEAL_TYPE, U.STATUS, M.USER_NAME FROM USER_ROOM_SELL U JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = REF_UNO) WHERE U.STATUS IN (1,2) AND REF_RUNO = #{userNo}
SELECT REF_UNO, REF_RUNO, USER_SR_NO, ROOM_TYPE, BUILDING_TYPE, U.ADDRESS, DEAL_TYPE, M.USER_NAME, M.PHONE FROM USER_ROOM_SELL U JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = REF_UNO) WHERE USER_SR_NO = #{userSrNo}
